code: import React from'react';import'./ProductCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-image",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-overlay",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"quick-view",children:"Xem nhanh"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-to-cart",children:"Th\xEAm v\xE0o gi\u1ECF"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"product-name",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-category",children:product.category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"product-description",children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"current-price",children:[product.price.toLocaleString('vi-VN'),"\u20AB"]}),product.oldPrice&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"old-price",children:[product.oldPrice.toLocaleString('vi-VN'),"\u20AB"]})]})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
